name: The Dirty Sweets - Angel T-Shirt
description:
Get your Exclusive limited edition T-Shirt for Auckland Rock band The Dirty Sweets.

 The Dirty Sweets have been getting some serious rotation on New Zealand radio stations Hauraki and The Rock lately with their latest single 'Black Dawg', and their latest music video for 'Monster Boogie' can still be seen on Juice TV (Channel search dirtysweetsnz on You Tube). 

 With their dedication to a powerful live set and regular live performances, The Dirty Sweets have just been selected and confirmed as the support for Urge Overkill at the Powerstation in Auckland on March 6th.

Details:

 4 (four) Colour screen print - featuring original artwork by Dirty Sweets Singer, Guitarist and Artist Paul Edwards. 

 T-shirts are unisex and in Black Only

 All sizes are a summer weight of 120gsm and are 100% cotton, except 2XL which is 155gam and 100% cotton (see sizes listed below).

Sizes:
Small 
120gsm 100% Cotton - W: 43cm L: 74cm

Medium
120gsm 100% Cotton - W: 46cm L: 76cm

Large
120gsm 100% Cotton - W: 49cm L: 78cm

X-Large
120gsm 100% Cotton - W: 53cm L: 80cm

XX-Large
155gsm 100% Cotton - W: 55cm L: 82cm

NB: Width measurement is a HALF chest

 All sizes are in extremely limited quantities and in short supply.

 Please take your measurements carefully, there will be no refund or exchange for incorrectly ordered size.

International shipping available

Item is sold on behalf of The Dirty Sweets
